test.janw.nl

Class Bat

  • java.lang.Object
    • test.janw.nl.Bat

  • public class Bat
extends java.lang.Object
    This class was written as a part of creating a squash program for the Open.HPI.de course "Java Capstone series 1." This class is responsible for the bat; it has attributes for x- and y-position and the speed It has a fixed length and height; it would be nice to get those as parameters in the constructore in a next iteration. It also remembers on which canvas (playing field) it is painted.
